content.question: Which of the following public policies would Republicans be most likely to support?

choices.label: Increasing government regulations in the market
Increasing oversight of the national government on small businesses
Reducing national government involvement in education
Reducing the role of state governments in health care

content.answer: Reducing national government involvement in education
